body:
Comment 2 by **assembler370**: 
Thank you very much my friend. To evrybody with oldy cpu's JUST put GO386=387 as a new
variable in Windows. I made the mistake of doing it on cmd (SET GO386=387), does not
work.
One more question doing GOARCH=387 works like GO386=387 ? or it is not valid?

Thnx u
